summary: This bill, the Accelerated Logistics and Coordination for Arresting, Transporting, and Removing Aliens Zones Act (ALCATRAZ Act), establishes a Department of Homeland Security grant program to reimburse states and local governments for costs related to detaining migrants. It mandates a report to Congress detailing plans to construct new detention facilities and identify funding sources for the program. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on August 22, 2025.
